description: Stockport boost their League One play-off hopes with a comfortable 3-0 win over Stevenage at Edgeley Park.
title: Stockport County 3-0 Stevenage
maintext:
Stockport County have won just one of their five previous Football League games against Stevenage (D1 L3), though that sole victory did come in this exact fixture the last time it was played in February 2023 (2-0).
Stevenage have lost just one of their last six away league games against newly promoted opponents (W4 D1), although that was their most recent at Crawley in February. The Boro last lost consecutive such matches in February 2019 (run of 3).
Stockport have only suffered two defeats in their last 24 league games played on a Tuesday (W10 D12), although both came at home (Crewe in February 2024, 1-3, and Wycombe in November 2024, 0-5).
Stevenage have failed to score more than one goal in each of their last 11 league games; only once before have they had a longer run without scoring twice in a game in the Football League, a run of 14 from October 2019 to January 2020.
